full_summary:
===========================================================

**Project Title**
---------------

Wasauksing Swing Bridge Structural Rehabilitation

**Contract Reference Number**
---------------------------

WS3943633470-Doc3945291262

**Procurement Category**
---------------------

Construction and Maintenance Services (Building and Facility)

**Project Overview**
-----------------

Public Services and Procurement Canada seeks to award a contract for the structural rehabilitation of the Wasauksing Swing Bridge, located in Parry Sound, Ontario. This project involves the repair of various infrastructure components, including localized timber repairs, replacement of mud sills, and steel repairs.

**Important Dates**
-----------------

*   Publication Date: March 31, 2023
*   Tender Closing Date: April 17, 2023, 2:00 PM
*   Expected Contract Start Date: May 5, 2023
*   Expected Contract End Date: July 28, 2023

**Selection Criteria**
-------------------

Not applicable, as the procurement method is an Advance Contract Award Notice.

**Contract Requirements**
----------------------

The successful contractor will be responsible for performing the required services, which can only be supplied by the Weeneebayko First Nation (WFN) on their land/territory. No other contractor or subcontractors will be allowed.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

*   Department of Public Works and Government Services (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Sheila Dhanna, Contracting Authority
*   Email: [sheila.dhanna@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sheila.dhanna@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
